name: Three Kingdoms Generals All
description:
The turn card game: Card Three Kingdoms Generals All, there are a variety of game difficulty modes to choose from, the cards achievement system support specific achievements to unlock the corresponding cards.

---------------------------------------------
Three Kingdoms (220 to 280 years, 184 years, 190 years or 208 years starting), the confrontation period of Chinese history, the split between the Eastern Han Dynasty and the Western Jin Dynasty, Wei, Shu and Wu three regime. Three Kingdoms era magnificent, full of life, often caused by a later memorial service. Jin Dynasty written by Chen Shou history books "Three Kingdoms", the study of the history of the Three Kingdoms are well worth consideration. Ming Luo Guanzhong Three Kingdoms history as the blueprint for the preparation of novel "Romance of the Three Kingdoms" has become one of China's four famous, colorful history connotation also spread to all over the world.
